personalInfo.name: Luca Bianchi
personalInfo.title: Technologist
personalInfo.tagline: Hi, I'm Luca Bianchi. I'm a passionate technologist with over 15 years of experience in Cloud, Artificial Intelligence and Software Engineering.
personalInfo.profile: I have over a decade of experience in AI Leadership and cloud-native development. Riding the Architect Elevator to connect different stakeholders, fostering innovation in a challenging yet evolving technology market. Honored as an AWS Serverless Hero, my expertise spans Typescript to Python, NextJS to cloud-native development, from data engineering to deep learning. As a co-founder of Serverless Italy events and a resonant voice in global AI dialogues, I bridge knowledge gaps, inspire digital transformations, and thus empower people and brands at their best.
personalInfo.additionalProfile: AWS Hero, cloud advocate, I have applied technology to real-life use cases. As a co-founder of Serverless Italy events and a resonant voice in global AI dialogues, I love matching architectures to practical experience, focusing on applied AI, and empowering people and brands. I host the "CTO Talks" podcast, where we dive deep into the latest technologies and interview industry experts.

experience.title: Field CTO
experience.description: As Field Chief Technology Officer, I support marketing and sales, shaping the company's AI and cloud strategy while managing research and development initiatives. Working with all company departments, I bridge different points of view while ensuring a scalable system architecture design for my products and swift adoption of emerging technologies. I provide support in top customer project definition and ground technical capabilities, defining constraints that impact P&L and ensuring well-architected solutions. I also establish and maintain key vendor relationships, aligning partnerships with our technological objectives.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: My role encompasses designing scalable system architectures and serving as the technical lead for the Digital Business Unit. I have focused on the applied AI outcomes and the relationship with key vendors, ensuring cooperation and goal alignment. I provide the technical management of our e-commerce accelerator product and delivery teams and support sales initiatives.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: I shape the startup growth with a fast-growing, sustainable vision in healthcare. I lead the dev team (internals and outsourcing) in defining the best architecture for our SaaS product. I support pitching and technical discussions, presenting our approach to AI and cloud to investors and key customers.

experience.title: Chief Technology Officer
experience.description: I led the company's growth from startup to enterprise through technological vision and software team management. I integrated cutting-edge technologies into our core product, Neosperience Cloud, to enhance customer value with a cross-functional team that spans the backend, web frontend, iOS, and Android. I moved the company delivery from monolithic backends to cloud-native microservices and managed dev teams to shift from monthly releases to weekly sprints with on-time production deployments.

experience.title: Mentor
experience.description: Mentor startups to build a strong value proposition for their products. Outline the business impact of cutting-edge technologies.

experience.title: Co-Organizer
experience.description: ServerlessDays Milano is a developer-oriented conference about serverless technologies. We believe in and encourage practical sessions in which developers share their experiences and lessons from real-world projects. ServerlessDays Milano is part of ServerlessDays (formerly JeffConf), a global series of events fostering communities around serverless technologies.

experience.title: R&D Manager
experience.description: As R&D Manager and developer, I led innovation within Neosperience Cloud, applying Machine Learning techniques to improve customer understanding and engagement. I actively contributed to the R&D team, focusing on Machine Learning and Blockchain technologies.

experience.title: Platform Evangelist
experience.description: Provide a technical and goal-oriented point of view on mobc3 platform Neos customers, showing everything that can be done with this technology. Develop comparative demos and live webinars. Provide technical support to pre-sale operations.
